title: Mainnet deployment documentation and live URL capture for Internet Computer app

requirements.summary: Enable a repeatable production (mainnet) deployment workflow and a place to record the final stable HTTPS live URL.
acceptanceCriteria: A production/live deployment is performed (not a preview/draft link).
A stable HTTPS URL for the deployed site is produced and recorded as the live link for the project.
The live URL opens in a browser without showing an "Unknown domain" error (allowing for normal certificate propagation delays).

file_operations.description: Create a single source-of-truth file to record the final stable HTTPS URL after mainnet deployment, including a short checklist to confirm the URL loads and notes about certificate propagation delays.

Add a convenience script that runs the documented mainnet deploy and prints/reminds how to retrieve the canister web URL after deployment. Use the selected github-export-icp-cli component as the reference for deployment workflow conventions (dfx usage, mainnet flags, and URL retrieval patterns). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add an optional verification helper that takes the recorded HTTPS URL and performs a basic availability check (e.g., request and status) and prints guidance if the domain is not yet ready due to certificate propagation.

requirements.summary: Expand frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md with complete, copy-pastable mainnet deployment and live URL retrieval/verification steps.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md includes end-to-end commands to deploy to mainnet (IC) from a clean environment, including prerequisites, build, deploy, and verification steps.
DEPLOYMENT.md explicitly documents how to obtain the final live HTTPS URL for the frontend canister after deployment and how to verify it loads.
DEPLOYMENT.md notes that SSL/certificate propagation can take time and suggests a retry window if the URL initially fails.

file_operations.description: Replace/complete the currently incomplete guide with end-to-end, copy-pastable steps: prerequisites (dfx + identity setup + cycles), clean install/build, mainnet deploy command(s), how to obtain the stable HTTPS URL for the deployed frontend canister, and how to verify it loads in a browser; include explicit notes about certificate propagation and a recommended retry window. Reference the selected github-export-icp-cli component for mainnet deployment conventions and the build-template-react/initial-app components for build command expectations. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a short section that links back to DEPLOYMENT.md and clarifies exactly what URL to paste here and how to confirm it is the stable mainnet HTTPS URL (not a preview).
